attributes.action: call an early general election to save Britain from any more Labour incompetents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British public can no longer sit back and watch this country be destroyed and we want an early general election to put right the follwing:

Rising knife and gun crime.

Year on year tax increases.

Increased legislation.

General government debt at 43.8% of GDP and rising.

All this cannot continue!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
